note: We were hoping that maybe you and your men could shed some light on these matters,’ said Commissar Palentine.
title: This is Thokar, wolf priest of Russ,’ stated Thokar, efficiently introducing himself and correcting the commissar simultaneously. ‘I’m afraid we missed all the fun. Our intelligence indicates that you were horribly outnumbered,’ observed the commissar. ‘Russ was with us today
We’ve had scattered reports of bestial creatures wearing fragments of Space Marine power armour

note: ‘I see...’ replied the commissar. ‘Very well.’ The comm signal died.
title: Have you ever battled Chaos? They are all mindless beasts wearing power armour,’ Thokar spat. ‘We have Khorne Berzerkers in the area, frenzied, skullrending killers. This area isn’t safe for your men. We’ll handle things. Go where you are needed. The Space Wolves will handle it from here
As the wolf priest and Wolf Guard walked back toward the ruins of the Outpost, the ancient yellow eyes of a predator tracked them
